title: Bug Slap
body: Hi i have been playing league for about 4 months now and my pc just got re fixed and then the bug splat message pops up as i open league and i ignore it. then after champion select the loading screen tab opens up then it just shuts down and the same bug splat message pops up and then it wont let me open it back up from the reconnect screen and this happens in every mode.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
